name: QUADTHANATOS
description:
QuadThanatos is a horror-infused mech shooting game with heavy MechWarrior influences.

Fend off waves of grotesque, twisted bio-mechanical abominations in your quadrupedal combat walker.

Technically no ending, when you get to the final wave there's no true end-state- when you die, you start all over at the beginning again. Which is kinda poetic, in a way. I'm just really lazy.

More of a prototype than anything. There are some bugs that I missed due to the razor-thin margin I gave myself with regards to the submission window. If you get a non-spawning bug after retrying just relaunch the game. Sorry about that. Quickly submitted a version with a minor fix that should remove that bug. Sorry about that. The old version is still there for posterity's sake.

I will release an expanded/fixed version at the end of the ratings window.

Majority of assets made in-house, other assets used are:

Rock texture diffuse base by Julio Sillet.

MilkShake made by Road Turtle Games.

Universal Sound FX by Imphenzia

VT323 font by Peter Hull

Less Perfect DOS VGA font by LÆMEUR
